special_abilities.name: Spellcasting
special_abilities.desc: The priest is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 13, +5 to hit with spell attacks).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The priest makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Glaive
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d10 + 2) slashing damage.

actions.name: Unyielding
actions.desc: When the priest is subjected to an effect that would move it, knock it prone, or both, it can use its reaction to be neither moved nor knocked prone.
